curl_examples.description: cURL commands for testing (replace YOUR_API_URL with your actual API URL)
curl_examples.schedule_appointment: curl -X POST http://localhost:5000/admin/scheduled-appointments -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"consultation_request_id":1,"dojo_tag":"your_dojo_tag","scheduled_date":"2025-10-15","start_time":"10:00 AM","end_time":"11:00 AM","address_text":"123 Dojo Street","parent_email":"sarah@example.com","parent_name":"Sarah Johnson"}'
curl_examples.reschedule_appointment: curl -X POST http://localhost:5000/admin/reschedule-appointment -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"appointment_id":1,"dojo_tag":"your_dojo_tag","new_scheduled_date":"2025-10-20","new_start_time":"11:00 AM","new_end_time":"12:00 PM","new_address_text":"456 New Street"}'
curl_examples.trial_class_booking: curl -X POST http://localhost:5000/trial-class-bookings -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"class_id":1,"parent_name":"Jennifer Martinez","email":"your-email@example.com","phone":"+1-555-0789","appointment_date":"2025-10-25","dojo_tag":"your_dojo_tag","status":"pending","number_of_children":2,"class_name":"Beginner Karate","instructor_name":"Sensei John Smith","trial_fee":25}'

important_notes: Replace 'your_dojo_tag_here' with an actual dojo_tag from your database
Replace 'dojo@example.com' with actual dojo owner email
Replace example parent emails with your test email address to receive the emails
For scheduled appointments, use the consultation_request_id returned from step 2
For cancel/reschedule, use the appointment_id returned from the schedule endpoint
Make sure your Zoho email configuration is correct in app.js
Check server console logs for email send confirmations
